title: Certificate
description: This is the certificate schema that contains any signature from an issuer certifying that the current key is allowed to sign certain documents types. The base document can include the certificate as a proof.

ttl.description: Seconds until expiration after the document was created (timestamp).

items.description: A URI describing the document type as JSON schema

documentTypes.description: A list of document types that the subject can sign.

items.description: A role that the subject can assume.

allowedRoles.description: A list of roles that the subject can assume.

keyLevel.description: The minimum required key level for subsequent certificates in the certificate chain.
